Class AircraftFactory

java.lang.Object
com.ft.pckg.aircraft.AircraftFactory
public class AircraftFactory extends Object
Factory class responsible for creating aircraft instances.

Design Pattern used: Factory.

    • newAircraft

      public static Flyable newAircraft(String type, String name, Coordinates coordinates)
      Creates a new Flyable aircraft based on its type.
      Parameters:
      type - aircraft type
      name - aircraft name
      coordinates - aircraft coordinates
      Returns:
      a Flyable aircraft instance
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - if the aircraft type is unknown
